item.description:
"oh, a visitor?"

you feel a gaze.

"im momo. this place is my little slice of the internet. it's small but it's...home. kinda."

you point at what looks like a telephone book on the table

"this? it's just a collection of online resouces which i think is cool to look at"

you ask why

"things get lost, you know"

the mess at the table draws your attention.

"oh don't mind that, it's just stuff i made"

their eyes soften.

"i like programming you see. websites, games and all that"

you notice a shelf filled with books and papers in messy scribbles

"those? just some scribbles you can read, i don't mind."

you look at the books curiously

"they are mostly about games, some tech stuff and the occassional rant"

a laugh

"sometimes it's fun to look back at what i was thinking and shake my head"

item.title: resources
item.description: Programming Fonts for my programming shopping spree. Also has nice editor color schemes to consider.

item.title: stuff i made
item.description:
LIT is a puzzle game about adding light colors, written in my custom C/C++ engine.

Dots and Circles is a simple bullet hell game where you can switch what bullet you can collect and avoid, written in my custom C/C++ engine.

fvf is a tool to decide your favourite font and a single elimination written in my custom JS framework.

Here's my Pathfinding Visualizer written in ReactJS.

I have a site dedicated to my FFXIV character Momoko Mopiko (it's still WIP).
